description: Hardware description and verification language extending Verilog with advanced features including SystemVerilog Assertions (SVA) for formal verification

common_errors.pattern: assertion passed vacuously|antecedent never true|implication vacuously satisfied
common_errors.cause: Implication assertion's antecedent (left side of |-> or |=>) never holds true, so property passes without testing the consequent
common_errors.solution: Add cover property to verify antecedent can be true. Check stimulus actually triggers the scenario. Review assertion for logic errors. Use cover to debug.

common_errors.pattern: sequence did not match|property failed|timing violation in assertion
common_errors.cause: SVA sequence expected certain timing or signal values that didn't occur in the trace
common_errors.solution: Use ## delay ranges for flexible timing (##[1:5]). Add $past() for value checking. Verify clock is correctly specified. Check for off-by-one errors.
common_errors.example:
// Flexible timing: grant within 1-5 cycles
assert property (@(posedge clk) req |-> ##[1:5] grant);

common_errors.pattern: randomization failed|constraint conflict|could not solve constraints
common_errors.cause: Constrained random generation has conflicting constraints making them unsatisfiable
common_errors.solution: Use constraint_mode() to disable conflicting constraints. Check for contradictory bounds. Use solve...before for ordering. Simplify constraint expressions.
common_errors.example:
constraint c1 { size inside {[1:100]}; }
constraint c2 { size > 50; }  // compatible with c1

common_errors.pattern: modport direction mismatch|interface connection error|incompatible modport
common_errors.cause: Module connected to interface with wrong modport or signal direction mismatch
common_errors.solution: Verify modport defines correct direction for each signal. Use explicit modport in port connection. Check signal names match interface definition.

common_errors.pattern: phase error|objection not raised|test terminated early
common_errors.cause: UVM test phases not properly managed, causing simulation to end before test completion
common_errors.solution: Raise objection at start of time-consuming phases, drop when done. Use phase.raise_objection(this) / phase.drop_objection(this). Check for missing super.run_phase() calls.

best_practices: Use assertions early in design, not just verification
Combine assert and cover to ensure non-vacuous checking
Use bind to attach assertions to RTL without modification
Use UVM for complex testbenches with reuse in mind
Run formal verification on critical protocol assertions
